message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SY

The paper discusses approximate inference in probability models, which is a fundamental task in machine learning. This topic is closely related to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), information theory (cs.IT), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and systems and control (cs.SY). Given the focus on Bayesian deep learning and the use of adaptive importance sampling, it is most likely that the paper belongs to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. However, the other sub-categories are also relevant and could potentially be applicable to the proposed framework and its applications.
